# Zensical Migration Stakeholder Signoff Template

Use this template to capture explicit stakeholder approval before cutover.

## Signoff metadata

- Date:
- Migration PR:
- Cutover window:
- Coordinator:

## Signoff checklist

- [ ] Readiness rubric reviewed.
- [ ] Preflight checklist reviewed.
- [ ] Communication plan reviewed.
- [ ] Rollback plan reviewed.

## Stakeholder approvals

| Stakeholder | Role | Decision (approve/hold) | Notes | Timestamp |
|---|---|---|---|---|
|  |  |  |  |  |

## Final decision

- [ ] Approved for cutover
- [ ] Hold for remediation
